description.value:
Special: Shocking, Reliable

Note: Fires an arc of Lightning. If weapon's damage is a 9 or 10, or it kills a target, the lightning arc jumps to another random enemy within 5 metres and automatically hits them in the body. This extra hit can cause further extra hits. Infinite Ammo, No Reloads needed.
